name: Draw It! 2
description:
The second part of the game Draw It!
With the help of drawing and physics - help the smiley to get to the platform.
Draw a smiley path using geometric shapes to get to the platform!
Use your imagination to achieve the goal!
You have a huge number of options!
Draw and reach the goal!
In Draw It! 2 is even more than levels and creativity







EACH LEVEL RESTART IS UNIQUE!

✒ 77 levels!
✒ Interesting achievements!
✒ low system requirements!
✒ creativity!
✒ Drawing!
✒ Intuitive gameplay!
✒ Realistic 2d physics!
✒ funny music!
✒ very low price!
✒ mode ArcanDrawIt!

Music by bensound
